title: Image Analysis Project via Object Detection and Spatial Consistency Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming and image processing concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasizes acquiring object detection skills applicable in medical/legal/technical fields. Provides hands-on training environments using digital devices (laptops, GPU servers, etc.).

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of the Spatial Consistency Loss function (SCLoss) for object detection in diverse environments (medical imaging, surveillance footage, etc.)
Learners can accurately identify boundaries of ambiguous object regions by applying SCLoss-based models to real-world datasets
Learners can quantitatively evaluate performance improvements (over 15% accuracy enhancement) in object detection models through project deliverables

resources: Python and Deep Learning Framework Installation Packages (TensorFlow/PyTorch)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
